content.description:
Engraving of sugar production on a plantation in the Spanish Caribbean, 1595, Theodor de Bry
© The Library Company of Philadelphia
content.question: Historical developments such as that depicted in the image helped advance which of the following?

choices.label: The conquest of the European continent by Spain
The spread of Spanish influence in the Western Hemisphere
The shift in European economies from capitalism to feudalism
The funding of Christopher Columbus’s expeditions to the Caribbean

content.answer: The spread of Spanish influence in the Western Hemisphere

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
